QuestData.Title: Magic Prehistoric
QuestData.Description: The owlbeasts' sacred caves are located to the east. Within several of these caves, you should find totems. I want you to approach these totems and gather whatever essence you can from them. The dreamcatcher should absorb this essence for use within Mazthoril.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Their totems are sacred objects. They will defend them ferociously.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: The ancient magic of the owlbeasts is powerful. But still...
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Essence of the Claw-Totem, the Essence of the Life-Totem, and the Essence of the Moon-Totem.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you doing, $n? We need that essence.
QuestData.RewardText: The dreamcatcher is charged. We are nearly ready to retake Mazthoril.
